<center> **Welcome to my website.** </center>

***

I am Economist. My fields of specialization are Industrial Organization, Regulation, and Antitrust. I have a PhD in Economics by the [Universidad de San Andrés](https://www.udesa.edu.ar/departamento-de-economia/economia), Argentina.

I am mainly at [dECON](https://cienciassociales.edu.uy/departamento-de-economia/equipo-docente/leandro-zipitria/) at the Universidad de la República.

I had a side project with Daniel Czarnievicz with the aim of visualizing data from Uruguay called [unaimagen](https://www.unaimagen.uy/), because "an image worth a thousand words".

My full CV is available in [English](files/english_CV.pdf) and [Spanish](files/spanish_CV.pdf).
